pages.text: $(li)The Bell is a decorative item that will emit sound when you right click on it.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/armorer)Armorers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:villagers/toolsmith)Toolsmiths$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:villagers/weaponsmith)Weaponsmiths$(/l) will exchange your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) by a Bell.
$(li)You can find Bells placed in the center of the $(l:patchouli:villagers/villagers)Villages$(/l).
